EmailTemplate.name: ARTL Event Completed With SRNumber
EmailTemplate.subject: Feedback Mail on Event Completed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Customer,
Thank you for your time. Please find the details of your Meeting with your Service Manager $OwnerFirstName$ $OwnerLastName$ below:
$MeetingNotes$
SR/FTR Number: $FTRNumber$}
We request you to share the feedback regarding the interactions Click here.
Sincerely,
Team Airtel Business
